name: Off the Board!
description:
How to Play

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to change the direction of gravity
  • Press the "R" key to restart if you're stuck
  • Press the spacebar or esc to pause
  • Slide all of the blocks through openings of the board and off the screen to complete the level

Note: there are usually multiple ways to solve one puzzle, although some may be messier than others! If you're stuck, remember that you can always restart, or even pause to select another level.


These blocks are tired of boring movement along a grid. Move them by changing gravity. Knock them, flip them, slide them, and get them off the board!

All assets and development were done by me during Curdle Jam #12.

Thanks for stopping by, and let me know what you think!
